solution_line_template: She needs to type an additional {total_words_needed} - {words_already_written} = <<{total_words_needed}-{words_already_written}={additional_words_needed}>>{additional_words_needed} words.
In one minute she can type {words_per_half_hour} words / {minutes_in_half_hour} = <<{words_per_half_hour}/{minutes_in_half_hour}={words_per_minute}>>{words_per_minute} words.

It will take her {additional_words_needed} / {words_per_minute} = <<{additional_words_needed}/{words_per_minute}={time_to_finish_minutes}>>{time_to_finish_minutes} more minutes to finish typing the report.
